params.actionData: abi-encoded calldata to execute on the target
params.target: account where the action will be executed

params.amount: amount of tokens to be transferred
params.token: address of the token to withdraw

execute(address,bytes).notice: Performs an arbitrary function call on a target contract, if the caller is authorized to do so.

setPermissions(bytes32[]).notice: Allows first caller to set permissions for a set of action identifiers

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows to send a limited amount of tokens to a recipient every now and then
